name: ziti-sdk-nodejs
description: A NodeJS-based SDK for delivering secure applications over a Ziti Network

scripts.build: npm run build:init; npm run build:c-sdk; npm run build:nodejs
scripts.build:c-sdk: cd deps/ziti-sdk-c; mkdir build; cd build; cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=debug ..; make
scripts.clean: node-gyp clean; rm -rf build; cd deps/ziti-sdk-c/build && make clean
